Articles.Content:
Let us just take a moment to appreciate how kind and friendly there forums are, and how kind and friendly the moderators are at keeping the Forums clean of spammers and trollers. Now let us take a moment to remember our manners and clear our minds of anything explicit, and keep these forums the way they are

Kind,

Friendly,

Supportive,

And appropriate for all ages.

All I have to say is, Thank you!

Sincerely Penguinhero

I agree with this!

I remember,back when the 0.18 was released,that my whole computer was crashing every time I played KSP.

I posted on these forums for help and someone asked for the crash log.

He then told me that he "never saw that before" and that the problem could be coming from my computer taking "," as decimal separator instead of "."

He has read the crash log for a total stranger,unfortunately,I didn't checked his name and the thread I had made was lost in the Great Forum Wipe.

If you recognize yourself in this post,I wish to thank you for your help and I also want to tell you that if you want to know the cause of the crashes,you just have pm me and I will tell you right away!
